players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Look for her alibi."
Bob: "Charlie, you're lying. I know you killed Diana because I investigated you last night."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Look for her alibi."
You: "Charlie, you're lying. I know you killed Diana because I investigated you last night."
